Audio - Class in Engine.Audio
This class defines methods that implement audio functionality
Audio(String) - Constructor for class Engine.Audio.Audio
The most primitive constructor, where the filePath is the only mandatory parameter The other attributes are set to appropriate default values
Audio(String, double, float, boolean) - Constructor for class Engine.Audio.Audio
The most practical constructor, setting the filePath, volume, panAmount and mute
Audio(String, double, float, boolean, int) - Constructor for class Engine.Audio.Audio
The more specialist constructor, setting the filePath, volume, panAmount, mute and buffSize Most users will not need to manipulate the buffer size Only necessary if the default value is causing audio artifacts
